PHRASE.LANG: Even the hair is spiky, not to mention the face paint design he has on. [#Legal]
Des pics jusque dans la coiffure, sans parler du maquillage et de son motif. [#Legal]
Selbst das Haar ist stachelig, ganz abgesehen von der Gesichtsbemalung. [#Legal]
Anche i capelli sono appuntiti, per non parlare del design del trucco che ha sul viso. [#Legal]
Hasta el pelo tiene pinchos, por no hablar del dibujo que lleva en la cara. [#Legal]
Even the hair is spiky, not to mention the face paint design he has on. [#Legal]
